name: Learning Resources
body:
# EmberJS
1. Go through CodeSchool Ember courses
2. Read Rock and Roll with EmberJS by Balint Erdi

# Ruby
1. Go through CodeSchool courses on Ruby and RSpec
2. Watch videos 1 and 2 on the Ruby Language
3. Go through recommended RubyTapas episodes: http://goo.gl/25weHK
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
